t:
I lay bleeding and hurt, hiding in the dark from the hunter, and prepared for the inevitable.

As he walked into his cabin, I savored the shock on his face as I leaped out of the dark and attacked him.
c:
As I tore into his flesh, I realized too late that he had rigged his body with explosives, and the last thing I heard was a deafening boom.



If you are good with words, you might like this: https://sherlockdoyle.github.io/antonemo/ (link also available in profile)


#horror #revenge #twist #creature #hunter #cabin #shock #darkness
